016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
020import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
021import org.apache.maven.project.DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest;
022import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionRequest;
023import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionResult;
024import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
025import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectDependenciesResolver;
026import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
028import org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystemSession;
029import org.eclipse.aether.graph.Dependency;
030import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyFilter;
031import org.eclipse.aether.util.filter.DependencyFilterUtils;
032
033import javax.inject.Inject;
034import javax.inject.Singleton;
035import java.io.File;
036import java.nio.file.Path;
037import java.util.Collections;
038import java.util.Comparator;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Optional;
041import java.util.stream.Collectors;
042
043/**
044 * Provides methods to compile a Maven project.
045 *
046 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
047 * @since 1.1
048 */
049@Singleton
050public class CompilerService {
051
052    public static final String MAVEN_COMPILER_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin";
053    public static final String MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-jar-plugin";
054
055    private static final String COMPILE_GOAL = "compile";
056
057    private final Log log;
058    private final MavenProject runnableProject;
059    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
060    private final ExecutorService executorService;
061    private final ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver;
062
063    @SuppressWarnings("MnInjectionPoints")
064    @Inject
065    public CompilerService(MavenSession mavenSession, ExecutorService executorService,
066                           ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver) {
067        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
068        this.runnableProject = findRunnableProject();
069        this.resolver = resolver;
070        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
071        this.executorService = executorService;
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Compiles the project.
076     * @return the last compilation time millis.
077     */
078    public Optional<Long> compileProject() {
079        Long lastCompilation = null;
080        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
081            log.debug("Compiling the project");
082        }
083        try {
084            executorService.invokeGoals(COMPILE_GOAL);
085            lastCompilation = System.currentTimeMillis();
086        } catch (MavenInvocationException e) {
087            if (log.isErrorEnabled()) {
088                log.error("Error while compiling the project: ", e);
089            }
090        }
091        return Optional.ofNullable(lastCompilation);
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Resolves the source directories by checking the existence of Java, Groovy or Kotlin sources.
096     *
097     * @return a map with the language as key and the source directory as value.
098     */
099    public List<Path> resolveSourceDirectories() {
100        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
101            log.debug("Resolving source directories...");
102        }
103        return mavenSession.getProjects().stream()
104                .map(mavenProject -> mavenProject.getBuild().getSourceDirectory())
105                .map(File::new)
106                .filter(File::exists)
107                .map(File::toPath)
108                .toList();
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Finds the Maven project that has the Micronaut Maven plugin defined.
113     *
114     * @return the Maven project
115     */
116    public MavenProject findRunnableProject() {
117        return mavenSession.getProjects().stream()
118                .filter(this::hasMicronautMavenPlugin)
119                .findFirst()
120                .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("There are no projects with the Micronaut Maven plugin defined"));
121    }
122
123    private boolean hasMicronautMavenPlugin(MavenProject project) {
124        return hasPlugin(project, "io.micronaut.maven:micronaut-maven-plugin");
125    }
126
127    private boolean hasPlugin(MavenProject project, String pluginKey) {
128        String[] parts = pluginKey.split(":");
129        String groupId = parts[0];
130        String artifactId = parts[1];
131        return project.getBuildPlugins().stream()
132                .anyMatch(p -> p.getGroupId().equals(groupId) && p.getArtifactId().equals(artifactId));
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Resolves project dependencies for the given scopes.
137     *
138     * @param scopes the scopes to resolve dependencies for.
139     * @return the list of dependencies.
140     */
141    public List<Dependency> resolveDependencies(String... scopes) {
142        try {
143            DependencyFilter filter = DependencyFilterUtils.classpathFilter(scopes);
144            RepositorySystemSession session = mavenSession.getRepositorySession();
145            DependencyResolutionRequest dependencyResolutionRequest = new DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest(runnableProject, session);
146            dependencyResolutionRequest.setResolutionFilter(filter);
147            DependencyResolutionResult result = resolver.resolve(dependencyResolutionRequest);
148            return result.getDependencies();
149        } catch (org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionException e) {
150            if (log.isWarnEnabled()) {
151                log.warn("Error while trying to resolve dependencies for the current project", e);
152            }
153            return Collections.emptyList();
154        }
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Builds a classpath string for the given dependencies.
159     *
160     * @param dependencies the dependencies to build the classpath for.
161     * @return the classpath string.
162     */
163    public String buildClasspath(List<Dependency> dependencies) {
164        Comparator<Dependency> byGroupId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getGroupId());
165        Comparator<Dependency> byArtifactId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getArtifactId());
166        return dependencies.stream()
167                .sorted(byGroupId.thenComparing(byArtifactId))
168                .map(dependency -> dependency.getArtifact().getFile().getAbsolutePath())
169                .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
170    }
171
172    /**
173     * Packages the project by invoking the Jar plugin.
174     *
175     * @return the invocation result.
176     */
177    public InvocationResult packageProject() throws MavenInvocationException {
178        return executorService.invokeGoal(MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN, "jar");
179    }
180}
